item.title: Vental Nation - Developement Team Needed *outdated*
item.dc:creator: @Mod-Vlad Mod-Vlad-
item.description:
@Mod-Vlad wrote:

[quote="`SJ_, post:19, topic:390988"][quote author=pk2play link=topic=486936.msg3570223#msg3570223 date=1302982576]
I can do pretty much about everything for PI except webclient ahah I can also do forums if u want
[/quote]

Liar.

good luck OP.[/quote][quote=“asshole_rule, post:20, topic:390988”][quote author=Mod-Vlad- link=topic=486936.msg3570145#msg3570145 date=1302977769]

I don’t know how this is going to be successful when your going to accept the first person you see post an application. You should wait longer and such, but good luck with the development.

Sir, I’ve talked to him. Watched his work. He is not bad coder tbh. I watched his project, how he working with my entire needs. So I know what im doing So thanks for comment and that you’re carring about. But im not a noob and i know what i need.
I wont take first person I see. Im checking people. =)
[/quote]

You obviously haven’t watched him enough. He’s posted on 20+ development teams already, all of witch has lied on the application. I went and looked at some of his applications and he lies about his age many times, along with lying about this expirience. He says that he’s been coding for 3 years on one thread, then 4 on another, and so on. His other project “project oregon” wasn’t PI based anyways. It’s clearly delta. This development will fail with developers that are liars/don’t know what they’re doing. Sorry to burst your bubble.[/quote]
Thanks for telling, and now I’m confused about what to do -.-
I dunno who’s saying right stuff and who i can trust to…
Hmm… HELP :C

Read full topic
